TopicTitle: I Challenge you! to challenge me!

Articles.Content: This is where you can give me a challenge! Any kind of challenge will do. A-Z all you can think of! I will post pictures in a quote to the challenge!:cool:

Hmmm... Needs more details, but I'll bite. I challenge you to return a Kerbal from the surface of Tylo.

No debug menu, no Hyperedit, etc.

Try to keep it 99% stock.

Do a Kerbin to Laythe transfer with as short transfer time as possible and record the amount of delta v spent. Then do a Kerbin to Laythe transfer for as little delta V as possible. Only stock parts and no Alt- F12 unlimited fuel and such. For the quick transfer you may dock with as many refueling vessels as you wish.

Might as well start off with a double challenge. With one part for piloting skills. And the other to see how fast a ship you can create.

This is where you can give me a challenge! Any kind of challenge will do. A-Z all you can think of! I will post pictures in a quote to the challenge!:cool:

SSTO from eve no infiniglide no ladder no mods no debug

Edited December 7, 2014 by chengong
build an accurate space shuttle. That's hard.

This is where you can give me a challenge! Any kind of challenge will do. A-Z all you can think of! I will post pictures in a quote to the challenge!:cool:

Build a craft that looks like a well-known type of animal (dog, bird, fish, etc.) The craft must be capable of doing what the real thing does (the bird must be able to fly and the fish to 'swim,' for example). All stock, no debug cheats. It's harder than it looks, and it's a lot more fun than many of the aforementioned challenges IMO.

Best of luck
Transfer 100 Kerbals from Kerbin to Moho - in one launch. I dare you!

http://www.kerbalx.com/crafts/212

DasValdez built this ship for novice players to fly to the Mun. But you can do better. Take it to Moho.

And yes, I believe this is possible. The ship has just over 8000 m/s of delta-V, and people have got to Moho with 7500. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/74375-Lowest-Delta-v-to-Moho if you want evidence and help.

(Incidentally I took it to Eeloo myself. Less delta-V needed, but sooooo much timewarping.)

SSTO from eve no infiniglide no ladder no mods no debug

You forgot "no Kraken Drive", one could probably use a conventional rocket to get up to Kraken speeds and SSTO with that.

You forgot "no Kraken Drive", one could probably use a conventional rocket to get up to Kraken speeds and SSTO with that.

it's not like the OP will attempt or succeed in any of this.
Before we can do this, we need some idea of what you're capable of. What do you think of as easy, what do you think of as challenging?

Before Christmas, plant flags on all the north poles. its as simple as that. You can use mods, sandbox, and no debug. all missing crew cant respawn, and no flight reverts. even if you are just testing a rocket design. If you wanna take yourself a step further, You are not allowed to use the same rocket design you used to go to recently visited planet systems. For example: If i use Rocket A to get to the mun, i can use the same design to go to minmus, but i cant go to duna, or eve. If i Use Rocket B to go to jools moons, i can use the same design to go to the other moons, but not the mun, minmus, eve, duna, etc. Have Fun!
